questions.question: Who is Romeo?

choices.answer: He's the leader of the city of Verona.
He's the 16 year old son of the Montague’s.
He's the 16 year old son of the Capulet’s.
He's the 15 year old son of Prince Escalus.

questions.question: Who is fighting at the beginning of the first scene?

choices.answer: Romeo and Tybalt
People standing around in the street
Servants of the Capulet’s and Montague’s
The Nurse and Peter

questions.question: Who tries to break up the fighting in the first scene of Act 1?

choices.answer: Nurse
Benvolio
Tybalt
Romeo

questions.question: What threat does the Prince make to Lord Capulet and Lord Montague?

choices.answer: They will all be put in prison.
They will pay a heavy fine.
They will be sent to France.
They will be put to death.

questions.question: Benvolio and Montague describe the way Romeo has been acting. What do they say about him?

choices.answer: He's sad, crying a lot, and moody
He’s absentminded and very forgetful
He’s angry and yells at everyone
He's sulky and insulting.

questions.question: Why is Romeo so sad in the first act?

choices.answer: He lost in a sword fight against Tybalt.
He lost a bet against Benvolio?
His dog died.
He's in love with a girl thatdoesn't love him back.

questions.question: What is Benvolio's advice to Romeo about Rosaline?

choices.answer: Send her a love letter.
Go talk to her and tell her how you feel.
Don't think about her--go find another girl.
Think about her a lot but don't talk to her.

questions.question: Why does Capulet think it will be easy for Montague and him to keep peace?

choices.answer: They are too fat to fight
They are too old to fight
They are too lazy to fight
They are too short.

questions.question: What does Paris ask of Lord Capulet?

choices.answer: He asks Capulet to sell him a piece of land.
a) He asks Capulet for Juliet’s hand in marriage.
He asks Capulet if he can take Juliet to the dance.
He asked for Lord Capulet's secret recipe for spice cake.

questions.question: What does Capulet give to the servant, Peter, and what is he supposed to do?

choices.answer: A guest list and- invite them to the party.
Dirty clothes to take them to the dry cleaners
A shopping list and he has to go to the market and buy food
A to-do list of things to do before the party.

questions.question: What problem does Peter have with the list Lord Capulet gave him?

choices.answer: The list is written in Greek, and Peter can’t read Greek.
Capulet’s handwriting is so sloppy that Peter can’t read it.
Peter doesn’t know how to read.
Peter lost his glasses and can't read the writing.

questions.question: How does Peter solve his illiteracy problem?

choices.answer: The nurse teaches him how to read before the party.
He uses Google Translate.
He runs away and never goes back.
He gets Romeo to read the list to him.

questions.question: What is the name of the woman Romeo loves before he meets Juliet?

choices.answer: Rosalind
Rosaline
Rosamund
Roses are red

questions.question: What do Romeo and Benvolio decide to do after reading the guest list? WHY?

choices.answer: They decide to sneak into the party to meet Rosaline.
They pretend to be servants so they can get some food.
They go to the party and start a fight.
They stand outside the window and watch.

questions.question: Why can't the nurse count 14 teeth in her own mouth?

choices.answer: She only has 3 teeth.
She doesn't know how to count.
She only has 4 teeth.
She hates counting.

questions.question: How old is Juliet and when is her birth date?

choices.answer: She’s 14 and her birthday is May 4<sup>th</sup>.
She's 13 and her birthday is July 31.
She's 12 and her birthday is July 31.
She’s 13 and her birthday is April 1<sup>st</sup>.

questions.question: When Lady Capulet asks Juliet how she feels about the marriage what is Juliet's answer?

choices.answer: Are you crazy? I’m only 13!”
"I think about it often.”
"It's an honor I think is better for other girls."
“It is an honor that I do not dream of.”

questions.question: According to Mercutio, who or what is Queen Mab, and what does she do?

choices.answer: She is an elf princess who grants wishes.
She's a witch who gives people nightmares.
She is a mythical fairy who gives men dreams of desires.
She is a Greek goddess who helps men dream of happy things.

questions.question: What does Mercutio say about dreams?

choices.answer: Dreams are nothing but silly imagination.
Dreams almost always come true.
Dreams are for fools.
If you can dream it, you can achieve it.

questions.question: Who is Tybalt?

choices.answer: Juliet's kind-hearted cousin.
Romeo's hot-headed cousin.
Benvolio's friend.
Juliet's hot-headed cousin.

questions.question: When Tybalt is ready to throw Romeo out of the party, what does Capulet say to Tybalt?

choices.answer: Guards! Seize him!
Romeo has a good reputation. Don't start a riot!
Romeo was invited, so leave him alone.
Let's just pretend he's not really here.

questions.question: What was the conversation about between Romeo and Juliet during the dance?

choices.answer: They talked about kissing and the hands of a pilgrim.
They talked about kissing the hands of pilgrims.
They talked about wishing they could be pilgrims.
They talked about the Pilgrims on the Mayflower.

questions.question: Who told Romeo and Juliet about each other's families?

choices.answer: Peter told them.
Tybalt told them.
Nurse told them.
They told each other.

questions.question: Who is Prince Escalus?

choices.answer: The King of England.
The Ruler of Italy.
The leader of Verona.
The Emperor of China.

questions.question: What does "star-crossed lovers" mean?

choices.answer: Two people who love star gazing.
People who get angry with the stars.
Lovers who will never be together.
Astronomers who fell in love.

questions.question: According to thechorus what has happened to Romeo's old love?

choices.answer: She moved to another city.
He has moved on; has fallen in love with someone else.
She got married to Paris.
She became a nun.

questions.question: What is Romeo's new problem now that he's in love with Juliet?

choices.answer: Juliet doesn't love him.
Juliet is from his enemies' family.
The Nurse won't let them see each other.
He doesn't know where she lives.

questions.question: What line of thechorus suggests why these young people fell in love?

choices.answer: They fell for each other's good looks.
They fell for each other's sense of humor.
They were destined to be together.
Their parents arranged the marriage.

questions.question: When Juliet says, "Romeo, Romeo, wherefore art thou Romeo?" who is she talking to?

choices.answer: Romeo
The Nurse
Herself
The moon

questions.question: Juliet asks Romeonot to swear by the moon...why is she afraid of this?

choices.answer: Swearing is just wrong and they will be cursed.
The moon is made of cheese and Juliet hates cheese.
The moon is very far away and so is Romeo.
She doesn't want his feelings to change like the moon.

questions.question: What is the only way that Juliet will give herself to Romeo?

choices.answer: They must get married first.
If Romeo promises to be nice to Tybalt.
If their parents agree to the marriage.
He must give her a diamond ring first.

questions.question: What does Romeo ask Friar Lawrence to do?

choices.answer: Give them marital advice.
Marry them in secret.
Help them run away.
Send them on a honeymoon.

questions.question: What was Friar Lawrence doing outside in Act 2?

choices.answer: Playing baseball with the other friars.
Planting tomatoes.
Mixing poisons.
Working with his plants.

questions.question: Why does Friar agree to marry the two young lovers?

choices.answer: It may stop their families' feud.
It seems like a nice thing to do.
He has to, it's his job.
The Nurse made him do it.

questions.question: Mercutio teasesthe Nurse, and she is outraged. What does Romeo tell her to calm her down?

choices.answer: He has a crush on the Nurse.
He likes to hear people talk.
He likes to hear himself talk.
He likes to hear the nurse talk.

questions.question: What is a "duel of wits?"

choices.answer: Using words to explain something,
Using words to tell jokes.
Using intelligent words to defeat someone else.
Throwing stones at someone.

questions.question: What does Tybalt send to the Montague's?

choices.answer: A challenge to Romeo.
An apology letter to Romeo.
A challenge to Benvolio.
An invitation to the next party.

questions.question: What information does Romeo give the Nurse?

choices.answer: Where and when the next party is.
Where and when the wedding will be.
Where and when they will move.
Where the church is located.

questions.question: Does the Nurse give Juliet the newsimmediately? Why or why not?

choices.answer: Yes, she tells her immediately because she’s happy
No, she waits until the next day because she’s very tired
No, she draws it out saying she has a headache and backache
Yes. but she tells her a lie.

questions.question: How does theNurse describe Juliet as she tells her the news?

choices.answer: She says Juliet is young and silly.
She says Juliet is a worry-wort and grumpy.
She says Juliet is annoying and troublesome.
She says Juliet is impatient and ridiculous.

questions.question: What is Juliet's mood as she waits for the Nurse's return?

choices.answer: Anxious
Angry
Heart-broken
Annoyed

questions.question: As Romeo and Friar Lawrence await Juliet, whatdoes the Friar warn Romeo about?

choices.answer: Love each other faithfully
Love each other in moderation
Love each other with patience.
Love eat other everyday.

questions.question: Who is Friar Lawrence to Romeo?

choices.answer: Romeo's distant cousin.
The Montague's priest.
A person Romeo can trust to keep his secrets.
Romeo's uncle.

questions.question: In what country does this story take place?

choices.answer: England
France
Italy
Spain

questions.question: Who wrote "Romeo and Juliet?"

choices.answer: William Penn
William Shatner
William Wadsworth
William Shakespeare
